languages.text: {n}Тело старика падает на землю. Заложники, увидев это, начинают двигаться быстрее и вскоре исчезают за поворотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тело старика падает на землю. Заложники, увидев это, начинают двигаться быстрее и вскоре исчезают за поворотом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело старика падает на землю. Заложники, увидев это, начинают двигаться быстрее и вскоре исчезают за поворотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear behind the bend.{/n}
{n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear behind the bend.{/n}
{n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

{n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}
{n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leiche des alten Mannes sackt zu Boden. Sobald die Geiseln das sehen, bewegen sie sich schneller und verschwinden bald um die Ecke.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leiche des alten Mannes sackt zu Boden. Sobald die Geiseln das sehen, bewegen sie sich schneller und verschwinden bald um die Ecke.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le corps du vieil homme s'effondre. Dès qu'ils s'en aperçoivent, les otages pressent le pas et disparaissent rapidement au détour d'un virage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps du vieil homme s'effondre. Dès qu'ils s'en aperçoivent, les otages pressent le pas et disparaissent rapidement au détour d'un virage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人的尸体倒在地上。那些人质见状，拔腿就跑，很快就消失了在转角处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人的尸体倒在地上。那些人质见状，拔腿就跑，很快就消失了在转角处。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人の体が地面に倒れる。人質たちはそれを見るや、足取りを早め、やがて曲がり角の向こうに消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人の体が地面に倒れる。人質たちはそれを見るや、足取りを早め、やがて曲がり角の向こうに消えていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo del anciano cae al suelo. En cuanto los rehenes lo ven, empiezan a moverse más rápido y desaparecen en la curva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's body falls to the ground. As soon as the hostages see it, they start moving faster and soon disappear around the bend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo del anciano cae al suelo. En cuanto los rehenes lo ven, empiezan a moverse más rápido y desaparecen en la curva.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adamın cesedi yere yıkılıyor. Rehineler bunu görür görmez daha hızlı yürümeye başlıyor ve kısa süre sonra bir köşeden dönerek gözden kayboluyorlar.{/n}
